import React, {useState} from 'react' import AlertContext from '../../context/Alert/alertContext' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState ({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '' }) const {name, email, password, password2} = user const onChange = e => setUser({...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Register Submited') } return (

Account Register

) } export default Register
